message: The QUALITY_ASSURE field for indicator 2-5-1b, translated into en
data:
FAO is responsible for the quality of the internal statistical processes used to compile the published datasets.

FAO. 2012. Cryoconservation of animal genetic resources. FAO Animal Production and Health Guidelines No. 12. Rome. (available at http://www.fao.org/docrep/016/i3017e/i3017e00.pdf)
